advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
discovery+ is the place for Reality, True Crime, Paranormal, Documentaries, Live Sport and so much more. Stream your favourite brands, including Discovery, TLC, Quest, Really, Quest Red, Food Network and more. From surprising human stories, to eye-opening documentaries and bold, exclusive Originals - there's something for everyone! 

Start watching now!

With discovery+ you get:
• Your favourite shows and personalities from the best TV brands including Discovery Channel, TLC, Quest, Really and more
• Front-row seats to Roland Garros, Grand Tour cycling, snooker, motorsports and so much more
• All the drama of 90 Day Fiancé! discovery+ is the only place to catch all the must-see moments and exclusive new series
• Exclusive discovery+ Originals - can’t-miss, exciting new series you won't see anywhere else
• Fresh new episodes and series added all the time - from reality and true crime to paranormal, documentaries, live sports and more
• Full access to watch anytime, anywhere on your mobile device, tablet, computer and connected TV*

Features:
• Browse or search with ease across the best in: True Crime, Paranormal & Reality, Sport and Documentaries
• Catch the action in Cycling, Tennis, Snooker and Motorsports, live and on demand
• Watch anytime, anywhere*
• Create up to five personalised profiles
• Pick up episodes where you left off across your favourite devices
• Save episodes to watch later with My List

Start watching now!

*Internet required.

Free content available when you download the app. Premium content requires a subscription. If your plan comes with a free trial, you'll be charged as a recurring transaction starting at the end of your free trial (unless you cancel during the free trial). Payment automatically renews unless you cancel before the end of the current subscription period. If you subscribed via the App Store, you can manage your subscription or cancel there. If you subscribed to discovery+ via web, you can manage or cancel your subscription in the Account section. discovery+ is available to customers in the UK and Ireland.

Terms of Use: corporate.discovery.com/discoveryplus/legal/terms-of-use/en

Cookies & Tracking Technologies Notices: corporate.discovery.com/discoveryplus/legal/cookies-and-tracking-technologies-notice/

Help Centre UK: support.discoveryplus.com/hc/en-gb 
Help Centre Ireland support.discoveryplus.com/hc/en-ie

We may work with third-party advertising companies and other partners that help us deliver tailored advertisements to you. To opt-out of behavioral tracking on mobile devices, you may use the DAA AppChoices Tool, available at http://www.aboutads.info/appchoices.

This app features Nielsen’s proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research, such a Nielsen TV Ratings. To opt out of Nielsen measurement on mobile devices visit Nielsen’s mobile opt-out pagehttps://sites.nielsen.com/legal/privacy-statement/nielsen_app_output/#.
